text: Allahe tomalokaka prabhuta yud'dhalabdha sampadara pratisrauti dana karaiche, yara adhikarai kerala tomaloka. Lagate te'om e'ito tomalokara babe tbaraanbita karaiche. Teraemi tomalokara paraa manuhara hata nibaraita karaiche, yate e'ito muminasakalara babe eta nidarsana haya. Teraemi tomalokaka sarala pathata paraicalita karae
